dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach conflicts in a forceful and confrontational manner, trying to 'win' the argument.
Your FarTwin will seek to find mutually beneficial solutions by working together with others to resolve disputes.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How willing is your FarTwin to take risks in pursuit of their goals?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out new, challenging experiences and take bold action to achieve their objectives.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh the potential risks and rewards of any decision before taking action.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize their financial goals?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on saving and investing in low-risk, conservative opportunities to achieve long-term financial security.
Your FarTwin will prioritize enjoying life's luxuries and taking calculated risks with their finances to create a more fulfilling experience.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use data and logical analysis to break down complex issues into manageable parts.
Your FarTwin will rely on their instincts, experience, and creativity to find innovative solutions to problems.

dimensions.label: Teamwork Preferences
dimensions.description: How comfortable is your FarTwin with working in a team?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out opportunities to collaborate and contribute to team efforts.
Your FarTwin prefers to work independently and may struggle with delegating tasks or accepting feedback from others.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prefer to learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin is a visual learner, preferring hands-on experience, diagrams, and images to absorb new knowledge.
Your FarTwin is an auditory learner, benefiting from lectures, discussions, and oral presentations to learn new concepts.

dimensions.label: Living Situation Preferences
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prefer to live their life?

options.description: Your FarTwin thrives in fast-paced, urban environments and enjoys being surrounded by people and activity.
Your FarTwin prefers quieter, more peaceful surroundings and values their personal space and solitude.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin is very open and expressive about their feelings, often wearing their heart on their sleeve.
Your FarTwin tends to keep their emotions hidden, only revealing them when they feel safe or secure with others.
